item.title: Dump MySQL Database but Skip Some Table(s)
Count Number of Tables in a MySQL Database
item.description: mysql> select distinct(TABLE_SCHEMA) from information_schema.tables; +--------------------+ | TABLE_SCHEMA | +--------------------+ | information_schema | | drcongo | | mysql | | performance_schema | | pseademo | | pseairaq | | sys | +--------------------+ mysql> select count(*) from information_schema.tables where TABLE_SCHEMA='drcongo'; +----------+ | count(*) | +----------+ | 333 | +----------+ 1 row in set (0.00 sec)
